تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop, 

 

I hope you’re well.

 

Would you be able to provide a copy of our insurance coverage for the experience center at EV LAB? I’ve had one of the brands ask for our coverage in case of any damage to their fleet of vehicles once in our showroom.

 

Thanks in advance.

 

Regards,

 

Adam

 

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F8JzjCwRG4i0YyvmtVfPSJPIxT%3Fdomain%3Dev-lab.io%2F&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C04fda406c8c44dd01a4f08dd403aa384%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638737342796582005%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Y%2Fe2YkG8hqPSltuoF5Nmav9L7O%2BE86WoRG2p7C1KycU%3D&reserved=0>

ID: CO9AG34_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Adam Aldous <aaldous@ev-lab.io>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-04 12:45
Subject: RE: EV LAB | Insurance Coverage
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Adam,

 

Please find enclosed the relevant insurance certificate. You may share this as well with partners as well, as needed.

 

However, please note that:

 

*	This only covers vehicle that are not registered
*	And it excludes vehicles that have motor insurance policy
*	There is cover for property in custody and control, but you need to be legally responsible for the loss for the policy to cover.

	*	Customer damages the car during a test drive would not be covered for example.

 

I insured you under the policy of Allied so that it is easier and much more cost effective than having a standalone policy for EV LAB.

*	Customer damages the car during a test drive would not be covered for example.

 

I insured you under the policy of Allied so that it is easier and much more cost effective than having a standalone policy for EV LAB. 

 

Also, I am still not recharging you anything. Starting next year, I will recharge you proportionally based on the sum insured declaration. This will likely amount to approximately AED 1,500 annually. 

 

Let me know if you need any further assistance.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

To: Adam Aldous <aaldous@ev-lab.io>
Subject: RE: EV LAB | Insurance Coverage

Dear Adam,

 

Please find enclosed the relevant insurance certificate. You may share this as well with partners as well, as needed.

 

However, please note that:

 

*	This only covers vehicle that are not registered
*	And it excludes vehicles that have motor insurance policy
*	There is cover for property in custody and control, but you need to be legally responsible for the loss for the policy to cover.

	*	Customer damages the car during a test drive would not be covered for example.

 

I insured you under the policy of Allied so that it is easier and much more cost effective than having a standalone policy for EV LAB. 

 

Also, I am still not recharging you anything. Starting next year, I will recharge you proportionally based on the sum insured declaration. This will likely amount to approximately AED 1,500 annually. 

 

Let me know if you need any further assistance.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
